home.welcomeSubtitle: Please login or sign up to continue.

login.title: Login
login.credentialErrorSuggestion: User not found or incorrect password. Don't have an account?
login.emailDoesNotExistSuggestion: This email is not registered. Would you like to create an account?
login.failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.success: Registration successful! You are logged in.
signUp.emailExistsSuggestion: This email is already registered. Would you like to log in?
signUp.successfulAndLoggedIn: Registration successful! You are logged in.

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least {{minLength}} characters.

profile.title: User Profile
profile.errorLoadingFallback: Something went wrong while loading profile data.

dashboardPage.title: Market Data Dashboard (Binance Futures Testnet)
dashboardPage.loginRequired: Please login to access the dashboard.
dashboardPage.noDataForSymbol: No data available for this symbol/interval.

dashboard.title: Dashboard

tooltips.botMode: Enables/disables automatic trading based on signals.
tooltips.leverage: Multiplier for your position. Increases potential profit and loss.
tooltips.stopLoss: Percentage from entry price to automatically close a losing trade.
tooltips.takeProfit: Percentage from entry price to automatically close a profitable trade.
tooltips.trailingStop: Dynamic stop-loss that follows the price, protecting profits.
tooltips.maxDailyLoss: Maximum allowable percentage loss of capital per day.

dashboard.noDataForChart: No data available to display chart, or data is still loading.
dashboard.selectSymbolInterval: Please select a symbol and interval to display the chart.

errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.incorrectPassword: Password entered is incorrect for this email.
errors.emailDoesNotExist: User with this email does not exist.
errors.noActiveAccount: No active account found with the given credentials or incorrect password.
